MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the L24 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Carr Lane and the surrounding area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:30AM due to faulty equipment. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 1:30PM. We will update this message if the situation changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:30AM on 4th March 2021
